titleInfo.title: Making a Difference in Children's Lives

mods.abstract: The Children's Defense Fund, a non-profit organization, created a summer enrichment program in Marlboro County [South Carolina] bringing together community resources, college students, educational experts, federal feeding programs and 600 children. This film shows the work that was done in South Carolina but the Fund is a "national organization with roots in communites across America" which coordinates the Black Community Crusade for Children, of which the Freedom Schools are a service arm
